title: George.Gently.S06E02.Blue.for.Bluebird.mkv
description:
George Gently - S06E02

Blue for Bluebird

Gently and Bacchus go to a family holiday camp to investigate staff and holiday-makers, after the body of one of the bluecoats is washed up nearby. The colourful inmates of the holiday camp, from the flamboyant owner and his sister, to the chalet girls, performers, lifeguards and guests, throw the investigation sideways as Gently and Bacchus uncover a story of jealousy, ambition and the dark underbelly of the permissive society. PC Rachel Coles is now part of the support system for Gently and Bacchus at the police station, with her modern policing ways which annoy Bacchus, while Bacchus is trying to spend more time with his daughter, but his ex-wife, Lisa, is opposing it
